name: genealogically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is related to the history of the past and present members of a family or families: They are all related genealogically. Society will become more genealogically diverse. See
genealogical
More examplesFewer examplesThe society is funding a project to digitize the library's genealogically relevant recordsTracing relations through only the father or the mother provides a way to relate more distant groups genealogically. The family as a whole has been traced genealogically by two family members,
